concept.title: Location Admin Overview
concept.shortdesc: Location Admin is an LBS component that contains common LBS libraries grouped for convenience in a single system component.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The LBS Admin component contains several unrelated APIs. Follow the links from the APIs section below to more information about the purpose of each of these APIs.

section.title: Required background
section.p: The reader should be familiar with the LBS architecture.

section.title: APIs
section.p: Several of the APIs contained by the Location Admin component are not directly related, but they may be broadly grouped by their intended audience.

entry.p: This API is used by application developers to create location aware applications.
This API is used to get and set the administration settings of the LBS subsystem.
This API is used to create plug-ins that integrate with A-GPS hardware.
This API is used to create Network Protocol Modules.
This API is used to read LBS debug logs.
This API is used to set the system clock from GPS.
